content: description the wendy cardigan is the perfect spring design to add to your handmade wardrobe it s beginner friendly and has a fun flirty feel it features a side slit and a cute tie to bring it all together this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is a kit with lionbrand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn you need to make your cardigan + the digital pdf of the pattern you can even customize your yarn colors there is a full video tutorial available on this cardigan check it out here 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-wendy-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/3hybp 3 https //youtu be/nertwo-pnuq
